BasheminClasses

Class Garage

  • java.lang.Object
    • BasheminClasses.Garage

  • public class Garage
extends java.lang.Object
    The Bashemin Parking Garage contains a single lane that can hold up to ten cars. Arriving cars enter the garage at the rear and are parked in the empty space nearest to the front. Departing cars exit only from the front. If a customer needs to pick up a car that is not nearest to the exit, then all cars blocking its path are moved out temporarily, the customer's car is driven out, and the other cars are restored in the order they were in originally. Whenever a car departs, all cars behind it in the garage are moved up one space.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Garage()
      Creates a new garage with MAX_SPACE number of empty spaces inside

    • Method Detail

      • arrive

        public java.lang.String arrive(Car hiCar)
        Parks a car inside the garage if there are empty spaces available
        Parameters:
        hiCar - the car that needs to be parked
        Returns:
        the status of the operation

      • depart

        public java.lang.String depart(Car byeCar)
        Moves a car out of the garage. If it is right next to the entrance, then it can leave easily. Otherwise, all the other cars in front of it need to be moved out temporarily to allow it to leave.
        Parameters:
        byeCar - the car that is departing
        Returns:
        the status of the operation

      • isEmptyAtPosition

        public boolean isEmptyAtPosition(int index)
        Checks if the current parking space is empty
        Parameters:
        index - the parking space that is being checked
        Returns:
        whether or not the parking space is empty as true for empty and false for not empty

      • moveOutAllCarsBeforeIndex

        public void moveOutAllCarsBeforeIndex(int i)
        Moves all cars before a specified parking space number
        Parameters:
        i - the parking space number. All cars before it must be moved out temporarily

      • cleanUpGarbage

        public void cleanUpGarbage()
        Cleans up the parking spaces that are not being occupied by any cars by making them empty

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Shows a literal representation of the garage. Occupied spaces are illustrated by showing the car's license plate and empty spaces are shown as "null"
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the current state of the garage
